snippet.title: Rock 'n' Roll Clams for ATARI ST/e
snippet.description:
This is Rock n Roll Clams for the Atari ST which is enhanced for Atari STe and Falcon using Blitter and DMA Audio. Okay, this is a weird game which you can read all about here: https://ataricrypt.blogspot.com/2023/06/rock-n-roll-clams.html Apologies for the quality which might be due to the emulator that glitched at times. Plus the game seems to enjoy crashing quite a lot (again probably my emulator). Time stamps and links:

00:45 - first game (it's agony to watch but I did well)
05:35 - I continue onto the next stage! 07:10 - crashes on me!!
07:30 - I played a different level which was really cool in parts.
11:00 - Continued on...
14:10 - Continued on but I had quit it thanks to the controls!!
16:16 - Time for another new level to play. (seaside... buggy)
19:33 - Another new level and this time in Mac's house.
22:47 - And we play a different level...
25:16 - Sigh, let's choose another level. (crashes at the end)
27:40 - Okay, I plodded onto another different level here.
30:15 - Finally, I end with the chip music taken from the ST game (love it)

My Atari ST website: https://ataricrypt.blogspot.com
Like what I do? https://www.buymeacoffee.com/AtariCrypt

#Atari #AtariST #AtariSTe #emulator #retrogaming #retrogames #chiptune #platformers #1990s
